channel.title: image on 我的測試區
channel.description: Recent content in image on 我的測試區

item.title: 短碼 - foldergallery
item.description: test1 ex1 {{*< foldergallery path="./gallery.files/" cols="4">*}} 內定show="one" more div.galleryimgs+a{ display:block; } $(document).ready(function(){ $('.gallery-5d2bf4e786808748c9feb89b0aaf74d7').featherlightGallery({ gallery: { next: '' } }); }); ex2 {{*< foldergallery path="./gallery.files/" cols="4" show="all">*}} 全部顯示,分為4欄 div.galleryimgs+a{ display:block; } $(document).ready(function(){ $('.gallery-5d2bf4e786808748c9feb89b0aaf74d7').featherlightGallery({ gallery: { next: '' } }); }); ex3 pre 下的行為 more div.
